Module kivakit.kernel
Package com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.language.threading.locks

Class Lock

java.lang.Object
java.util.concurrent.locks.ReentrantLock
com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.language.threading.locks.Lock
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Lock
public class Lock extends ReentrantLock
A lock subclass that adds convenient features to ReentrantLock. whileLocked(Code) and whileLocked(Runnable) run the given code while the lock is held.
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
See Also:
